content: **crocheted hat in drops soft tweed the piece is worked with half-treble crochets and folded textured edge ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern st-016 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - m/l fits head-size approx 54/56 - 56/58 cm **materials** drops soft tweed from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100 g colour 02 marzipan 50-50 g colour 04 cookie dough **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 mm **crochet gauge** 20 half-treble crochets in width and 15 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
